Assessment.QuestionText: Which of these statements about Help in Windows Forms are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: The <font face="courier new">Help</font> class exists in <font face="courier new">System.Windows.Forms.Help</font> namespace.
The Content component of a help file displays the favorite topics in the right pane.
The <font face="courier new">ShowHelp()</font> method of <font face="courier new">Help</font> class displays the help file contents.
The <font face="courier new">ShowPopup()</font> method of <font face="courier new">Help</font> class invokes the help file in the application.
One of the parameters in the <font face="courier new">ShowHelp()</font> method is the element of a help file to be displayed.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(False), (B)-(False), (C)-(True), (D)-(False), and (E)-(True).
